channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Absolute Genius: Monster Builds
channel.desc: Dick and Dom go head to head with the fiercest forces in nature as they enter the genius world of engineering against floods, wind and earthquakes. They head to the Netherlands to see how one of the world's great coastal defences keeps the sea at bay, find a suitably hair-raising method to put earthquake proofing to the test and tackle gale-force winds in their bid to stormproof their most precious possessions.
